Principal Architect, Identity and Access Management: Designing and deploying effective technology solutions
October 17, 2017, Sekhar worked with Caedmon in the same group

I've had the pleasure of working with Sekhar for many years. He is a technical professional very knowledgeable in all aspects of identity and access management (directory services, WAM, federation, provisioning, identity analytics, etc). As a technical lead on projects, he uses his diverse technical skill set to insure the timely delivery of well-designed implementations. He is a creative and mature developer who is always looking for new ways to solve business problems. I love his tenacity when it comes to problem solving - he is always striving for excellence and will put in the hard work to achieve it.
